content.json: Top 5 Users by Number of Failed Attempts

content.query: CommonSecurityLog | extend outcome = split(split(AdditionalExtensions, ";", 2)[0], "=", 1)[0]| extend reason = split(split(AdditionalExtensions, ";", 3)[0], "=", 1)[0]| where outcome =="Failure"| summarize Count= count() by DestinationUserName| render barchart

content.json: Top 5 Users With The Highest Number Of Logs

content.query: CommonSecurityLog | summarize Count = count() by DestinationUserName| top 5 by DestinationUserName| render barchart
